description: It's just a couple of well-built EMTs, doing their job, standing by at the dispatch house, on call, ready for anything. Brandon knows this could be an opportunity to execute a few smooth moves in order to finally get into handsome James' pants.  Sure enough, when Brandon lays his eager hand on James' bulge, his advances are warmly accepted.  Brandon doesn't waste much time going to his knees and taking James' large, thick cock into his mouth.  This is juuuust what James needed.  A little relaxation from the stress of being on call, and also a moment to take his mind off his prudish girlfriend.   As James works his hips back and forth, fucking Brandon's inviting mouth, he gets the idea he should stick his dick in Brandon's ass.  Brandon turns out to be totally into the idea and James puts it in and slams Brandon hard.  Let's hope these amazing studs can shoot their hoses off before their next emergency call.  Join the fun and find out! Enjoy!
title: Fire Drilled
